website_summaries.verdict: Delivers quite a bit less fat than other nut spreads, with a chocolate flavoring at a low price.
pros: Has a great taste, mixing chocolate and peanut butter
Great addition for protein shakes because of consistency and taste
Free of dairy, gluten, and soy, which is perfect for those who have food allergies
cons: Some people feel the chocolate flavor overwhelms the peanut butter flavor

customer_reviews.title: Glass Particles Found in Powder!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I typically get Tru-Nut Peanut Butter powder but since this was sold in bulk I thought I would try it out. I am so very disappointed to find GLASS PARTICLES in the powder!!!!!! The container is filled with it!! So much so that I fortunately was able to notice before eating it. I'm so disturbed by this! Amazon needs to regulate these sellers better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa weltz

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the chocolate?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this product for several months, and it used to be great! The last two times I bought it, it tastes (and looks) like the regular peanut butter flavor, not the chocolate peanut butter flavor. It's still good, just not the flavor I wanted. I wrote the company asking if they had changed their formula or if there was a manufacturing problem, and never got a response. If you want something chocolatey, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Gritty
customer_reviews.text: I have had PB Fit in thw past and loved it so I wanted to try the chocolate this time around. It seems they didnt completely grind the peanuts so it does not blend smooth. You get dehydrated bits of peanut throughout the mixture and they get stuck in your teeth. I wont be able to eat this. I dont hate anyone enough to give this away so it will end up innthe trash.
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it way too much. IPBfit All-Natural Chocolate Peanut Butter Powder sales person, working solely on commission. I could resign from my current job the my income would far exceed my wildest dreams. Everyone I know has heard about this product from me. Over and over and over. The taste, the texture, the sheer delight is impossible to measure against anything else. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: PB without the calories
customer_reviews.text: I'd wondered for awhile wth peanut butter powder tasted like. I was curious to get some both for making smoothies but as well as mixing with soylent (yea, read my other reviews -- it gives me a way to have lunch in a pinch). I tried this just as a peanut butter mixed on a spoon. omga. It's quite darn impressive. It actually tastes a bit like peanut butter. While I"ve been trying to watch more calories this helps me get my pb fix. The chocolate flavor isn't as strong as I'd hoped but there is a hint. This is delicious and I'll be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: BluePandaTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been adding this product to my Designer Protein Essential 10, Belgian Chocolate, Plant Based Meal Replacement Protein Powder for years now. I believe with this last shipment, they have changed their ingredients for it!! There is now little pieces of who knows what in it. I hate it. The texture is Awful!! And I blend the powders! It has always been smooth. I am not ordering this product any more.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic particle
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this until I opened the container today, after a few months to find something plastic looking...and hair. Not mine since I have very long hair and the hair is attached to the plastic particle. Now im grossed out and dont want to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kdeb831

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter loves meet your new favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: Think this is my 4th bottle if buying? This is the absolute best if you’re a peanut butter lover but don’t love all the calories and fat it has for such a little amount. I mix this with almond milk and make a nice consistency paste and use just like normal peanut butter. I also use in all my chocolate protein shakes. Makes them so good. And it has protein in it too which is just a double win. You get a big tube for a good price. I’ll always have a bottle of this at my house forever
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes much better than anticipated! Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical that a powdered product could actually taste good. I've been proven wrong. This Chocolate Peanut Butter powder tastes very similar to peanut butter. The consistency is not the same, but the taste is there. The consistency is comparable to yogurt but less runny and has tiny specks of peanuts. I put two scoops into a small bowl/ramekin and then mixed in the suggested amount of water. I put it on top of English Muffins, saltine crackers, and more! Very easy way to get the extra protein needed with out the fat. Highly recommend. Pros: Flavor Easy to make Cons: Consistency. If your a texture person this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Very gritty/crunchy compared to PB2. Tastes similar, but hard to get past texture.
customer_reviews.text: I mix PB2 with yogurt. I have been doing that for several months. Someone suggested I try this and it had a better price so I ordered one. The texture is coarse and it doesn't dissolve as readily. It tastes almost exactly the same but the texture is like I have sand in my yogurt. I won't order it again. If dissatisfaction was an acceptable reason for returns I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF PEANUTS NOT COMPLETELY POWDERED
customer_reviews.text: LATEST JAR OPENED - PEANUTS NOT FULLY POWDERED" - EVEN IN BLENDER 50 SECONDS - FEELS LIKE SAND BITS IN BLEND - ALL SMOOTHNESS LOST. CALLED PB COM - ONLY WILLING TO REPLACE ONE JAR - PROBLEM ALLEGEDLY WITH CHOCOLATE PB FOR ONE REG PB - THO BOUGHT 6 LARGE ON LATEST ORDER. BEFORE......Have used this chocolate p-nut powder product for at over 12 mos, mix chocolate protein drink and unsweetened almond milk and sugar free chocolate instant pudding - this has been my only dessert I have had for over a year, lost over 50 lbs, kept it off, along with a few other changes,e.g., use romaine lettuce leaves for bread.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well in shaker. Healthy Reece's shake.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased pb powder before & depending on brand sometimes they don't blend well. This pb fit in chocolate is excellent at blending easily in just a shaker bottle with the wisk inside. I add some milk or almond milk, ice, some of this pb fit & it's perfect. Like a Reese's shake without a ton of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulk buy and less expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have recently started changing my habits to purchase larger quantities, ordering less frequently, and re/ using less plastic. Not sure if you read the study about micro plastics in drinking water. I like these because this container will last me at last 6 mo if not more and after it is used, I love the uniform shape of this container to reuse it or do a project with my daughter. I buy it to flavor my milk salty not so much the protein. I add it Fairlife milk with 13 g of protein per 8 oz.
customer_reviews.author: onlygreen

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big peanut butter fan, but decided to start eating healthier. Bought a bottle of this stuff at the store and now am hooked and buy these large ones. I don't mix, rather just eat it out of the jar. This brand has a very unique blend... meaning, it doesn't taste like flour (like others I've tried), has true PB flavor, it does not clump between teeth like others, and it also has tiny, tiny, tiny shards of sugar and salt all throughout that give it a light crunch and ridiculously yummy after tones. The chocolate is subtle, but it's there (wish it had more cocoa flavor :) Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bakercoalition

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Counting calories really makes you realized how many calories are in traditional food items, like peanut butter. PBfit takes most of those calories away, leaving you with a product that is truly just as good as "real" peanut butter. It tastes excellent on bread, in recipes, or even mixed into a protein shake. I was disappointed to see that the price went up over $5 during the COVID pandemic, but ordered it anyway. If you love peanut butter, but hate the 200 calories that come in a serving, PBfit is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other powders and they are blah. This one tastes much better. I mix it in cool whip and it tastes awesome! I can't even tell you how good it is!!!! We also use it in smoothies and mix it for toast for a low cal meal. It doesn't taste like Jif because it doesn't have all the fat but is the best powdered one we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Gearty

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I use my powdered peanut butter for everything! It has gotten very expensive in the stores and that is for a small container. I have been using this brand for a long time. It mixes well, and never clumps, gets old, tastes bad, and it mixes well with other ingredients. I use it to cook and bake. I make my Thai Peanut Sauce with it, I make brownies, ice cream, whipped mouse, etc. I even use it in smoothies! It is healthy, low fat and calories and sugar. I haven’t used regular PB in years. You can even turn this into pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: I love this chocolate peanut butter & add a little 1/3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this chocolate peanut butter & add a little 1/3 less cream cheese with a packet of trivia & it is wonderful to mix in brownies before baking or use as a spread on top. I just eat it plain or as a dip for celery! The ways to use this are endless!
customer_reviews.author: pam talkington

customer_reviews.title: Meh no chocolate flavor double sugar from regular PBfit
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to see the chocolate PBfit on subscribe and save through Amazon. What happened to the chocolate flavor? This has same taste at regular PBFit but double added sugar with NOTHING to show for the change. Yes the end result calories are the same but if you are counting sugar and carbs this gives you NOTHING different than PBFit in taste with more sugar. What gives, had this a few months ago and it was outstanding chocolate and peanut butter. Bummer. Cancelled subscribe and save auto shipment. We will go back to adding cocoa to our PBfit.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Maples-Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on the recommendation of the personal trainer at my gym to increase my protein intake. I was surprised at how good it tastes. I mix it with vanilla Greek yogurt, sometimes with a banana. Also used it on low fat ice cream, in pancake mix, and pudding. Comes with a pdf cookbook with many recipes. PBfit also comes without the chocolate. Tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: YUMMMMY
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make a healthy version of a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup...in a green protein smoothie! Oh yes, you can. Use Almond/Soy chocolate milk, 1-2scoops of PB-Fit Peanut Butter Powder, a scoop of your fav cocoa powder, add your greens, protein powder, plus whatever other health powders you choose to add and just blend.....can I say super-yummm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Italiana

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SUPPLEMENT/DIFFERENT SOURCE OF PROTEIN
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get a full source of clean protein with a different taste and ingredients than normal sources like Whey protein powder. VERY TASTY WITH A BETTER AFTERTASTE AS THE NORMAL PB FIT PEANUT BUTTER TASTE. BOTH ARE GOOD SOURCES OF PROTEIN AND HEALTHY FATS. I mix 3 scoops of chocolate whey protein with 2 scoops of either PB Fit flavor. Both are excellent. Healthy Reese’s PB cup taste liquified. OTHER THAN A TINY AMOUNT OF SUGAR, THIS IS A SUPERFOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Coach J.CURTIS

customer_reviews.title: Closest to regular peanut butter than any other brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of powdered peanut butter. Other brands so far have had weird textures, bad aftertaste, no flavor, etc. This one tastes like extra smooth peanut butter. I like the non chocolate version also, but this is my favorite. I prefer extra chocolatey, so I add a little cocoa powder to the mix as a personal preference. Easy to mix to make sandwiches, or for mixing in drinks or shaking with popcorn (too much butter will coagulate it before you get it throughly mixed though.)
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: We love PB2
customer_reviews.text: -click helpful if helpful- I am a regular user of PB2. Not only do I add it to protein shakes but I often will make it into actual peanut butter to spread on sandwiches. My kids LOVE it and so do I. Besides TJ Maxx which occasionally has this product, Amazon is the best and cheapest place to get it. Only issue this time was I didn’t realize I ordered the chocolate kind and I was not a fan. I like the regular flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I tried PBFit after a recommendation and I love it. I need to keep fat and sugar to a minimum in my diet, but I love peanut butter on waffles or as a dip. Since you add water to make the pb, you can make it as thin or as thick as you like. Sometimes I have it thin like a peanut butter syrup. I will order again in the future if I can't find it in the store. The sugar-free one is a little harder to find on retail shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I put it in my breakfast smoothie and it is delicious! I used to purchase it at Costco but they stopped carrying it (not sure why; checked with customer service at Costco and they could not give me a reason they were discontinuing it). Very happy I found it on Amazon; same size jar and same price Costco sold it for. I would recommend it to anyone! I have also just mixed it with water to make peanut butter and it is so yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Austin

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much that I am afraid that it's too good to.be true. I mean it's not but how could something so good and vegan be so tasty and low in fat. Usually I use in my smoothies but here is another thing I do. I couple of heaping tablespoons mixed with a little bit of water and vegan whipped cream. You get this low fat, vegan chocolate peanut butter moose and it's delish. Has anyone lost weight using this? Thx .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: What a Treat
customer_reviews.text: I am on the Keto diet and use it for a little sweet treat. I use the dry powder and add some sweetener to it when I want a little something else. Otherwise, you can add it to a protein shake which I have also tried and enjoyed. The chocolate in it gives it a little something extra.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores A

customer_reviews.title: Gritty:(
customer_reviews.text: First jar was perfect. Second jar, not so much. Same problem posted by other reviewers; no matter what you do, you can not get a smooth, non-gritty texture. I use this exclusively for peanut butter sandwiches, so there is no hiding the grittiness. It will take me a while to get through this jar (too cheap to toss!), but I won't chance another purchase:(
customer_reviews.author: E. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, color is unexpected
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great and it’s a much better value than its competitor brand that’s sold at the health food store. My only question is about the lack of rich brown chocolatey color. How do you get excellent chocolate flavor like you have with this delicious product, but have a color only slightly darker than plain peanut butter? Analysis anyone?
customer_reviews.author: TLK

customer_reviews.title: It's addicting
customer_reviews.text: Watch out, this stuff is so addicting! I mix the PBFit with water and cinnamon every morning and put it on a low carb wrap...so good and addicting. The hardest part is definitely the liquid to powder ratio (I don't use any kind of measuring device) but it's super simple to correct. I also wouldn't say that the peanut butter and chocolate have a strong flavor but for 1/3 the calories, I can deal with a more subtle taste.
customer_reviews.author: Buys A Lot

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum 🖖🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is the save stuff Costco carries and save size Altho the Costco stuff is about $10 more and contains OMEGAS in it which this is disappointing that it doesn't but the proce us amazing and u can always add a little safflower oil to get the good omega and healthy mono and poly unsaturated fat ! Also it works if u mix it with milk too and tastes even better but obviously more calories that way
customer_reviews.author: TheUnicornTree

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Lower Calorie Needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item as an additive for smoothies, but making it for a peanut butter spread isn't bad either. I needed a lower calorie option because I am on weight watchers. With this powder, some almond milk and a banana I can make myself a delicious 2 point shake and the PBFit Really gives the beverage somebody so that it is filling. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This batch was off
customer_reviews.text: I buy this all the time and love it but these 2 jugs had a gritty/grainy texture, not the usual smooth texture. The flavor was as good as always and we used it all up!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like regular peanut butter, but it's good.
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut out saturated fat, but I still like a pb&j rollup every now and then, so I found this stuff. Initially I tried the regular flavor, but then decided I wanted chocolate too. It's good. It doesn't taste like the real thing, but it's good. Plus, because you mix it yourself you can decide how thick or thin you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Birkemeier

customer_reviews.title: Great value and delicious taste smooth texture
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought this was going to be disgusting but it's delicious. SUPER VALUE for the money blends in deliciously and smoothly with anything added to a your smoothie
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as PB2
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy PB2 with chocolate to use as flavoring with my unflavored whey protein. This is a more affordable and uses less containers than PB2. The flavor is unnoticeable to the PB2 with chocolate and as far as I can tell isn't any different in consistency or quality. I will continue to order this stuff for the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N.

customer_reviews.title: never buy 2 before you try at all,hv a lover of it in the wings.
customer_reviews.text: the preparation, the taste for me is the worse,im sorry, i m a peanut butter connoisseur of all things peanut butter, never thought id say this. This stuff pissed me off,it taste so bad to me. Im affraid to try giving it away. I will try cookies. Im the cookie lover,so wish me well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The powder tastes funny.
customer_reviews.text: This run of powder has a taste that's not acceptable to my wife. I didn't take the time to taste it. She says it tastes like raw soybean. I hope there's no soy in the peanut powder! Maybe raw peanut??? Flavor? We buy a lot of this produce and have never had a complaint till this run.
customer_reviews.author: ronald s cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Supplement for peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product to replace sweets. Add to frozen yogurt and whole milk, it taste like Dairy Queen’s peanut butter shake
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lynn Maples

customer_reviews.title: Where's the chocolate?
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup in a powder, this is NOT it. It's peanut butter, it's sweet, but the chocolate flavor is lacking. The fact that it's almost the same color as the regular PB2 should have been a clue. I will have to mix it with cocoa powder.
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: A better way to get peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add to 20 lbs of vanilla protein powder as a way to "switch things up" but I have not done that yet. The kids like to mix small portions and dip apples and I have enjoyed the same. I was curious about the reviews stating the texture is less than smooth but I like it. I am a fan of crunchy peanut butter so the texture does not bother me. We can definitely taste the chocolate! I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LizardLvr

customer_reviews.title: It's my fault...
customer_reviews.text: that this isn't what I wanted my attention to detail is awful but I wanted a PB powder for my keto coffee. This took out a lot of the fat that I need from the PB but it tastes good, mixes well and does what its supposed to, just not what I need it for. 5 stars but not ideal for keto coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy. Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I’ve bought this several times. I love it. Like, I REALLY LOVE IT!! I CRAVE it!! But the last batch I bought has peanut chunks in it. I thought maybe I bought a “crunchy” version. Nope. Read some recent reviews and the same thing. Ugh! Please fix this issue!!!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget the bananas
customer_reviews.text: I have used this enough to say it works or do what it's supposed to do but it tastes great wih bananas cut and mixed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and price
customer_reviews.text: Quickly becoming my go-to for powdered peanut butter. Good flavor and price. It’s the 3rd brand I’ve tried and on par with PB2, though generally less expensive. Found mixing it with things other than water (unsweetened almond milk, sugar free coffee creamers) adds a real sweetness to it, just don’t over-do, since it also adds calories.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Adds a nice peanut butter flavor to my protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: Adds a nice peanut butter flavor to my protein shakes, with less than half the calories of what I would take in with regular peanut butter. This product will be added to my subscribe and save. One note, you do have to mix this in well, as sometimes I end up with chunks in my shakes, but they still taste good!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Very creamy try different recipes.
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried this I really liked it! My son enjoy the way it tastes to.we're going to try the organic kind next. I saw other reviews that said this had glass in it.Please take your time while opening the product and examine it carefully I only saw sugar cane grains in it.We really like this product we eat it in ice cream and use it for other fruit snacks as dipping as well.I'm going to try this in different recipes I find online.
customer_reviews.author: Miss.SunShine

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product for years. The first ones I order were great taste almost fudgie. This last order is not the same taste is way off , its bitter. I was told it was not returnable. If it stays like this I won't order agin.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Walters

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: First this is a great deal. You get more product for about the same money I was spending ona different brand. I love the taste of this. I have only added it into my protein smoothies in the morning. I have purchased the regular which I intend to try making a spread with. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an overwhelming chocolate taste, but I like that. It combines well with my chocolate protein powder smoothie that I make every morning. I have zero complaints and love that I get my coveted peanut butter flavor in my smoothies. Will continue to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: PB2 All-Natural Chocolate Peanut Butter is SO good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!!! The taste is so yummy! You do not miss the fat that isn’t in this product. We stopped buying regular peanut butter to use PB2 Peanut Butter Powder. This version with the chocolate in it is SO yummy! It is such a delicious option...
customer_reviews.author: G. Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Substitute
customer_reviews.text: Being a diabetic I need to watch all sugar and this peanut butter gives me the joy of eating an old fashioned pb&j sandwich! I pair it up with Smuckers no sugar preserves and it’s a treat! Tasty
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Gritty.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pbfit, it's well-known to all. However, the chocolate is very gritty. The regular pbfit is incredibly smooth, which is one of the reasons I love it, however the chocolate has a weird consistency. I'm not sure I'll be able to get through the container (and the regular pbfit I was through the 30oz. container in a week). Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Low Calorie and Low Fat. The Perfect Alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I never used to like peanut butter much and stayed away because of the high calorie and high fat content. This stuff is really good, though and it doesn't have all the fat and calories. I've used both the regular peanut butter and the chocolate peanut butter for a little bit of the chocolate taste. Great stuff! There is no question this will become a staple in our pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Montville

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix as smoothly as the kind without chocolate in it, but good flavor. My kids really like it in smoothies and milkshakes, and it's a lot better for them than regular peanut butter and chocolate sauce. The price is excellent too. We'll be getting it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor isn't bad but I find it is hard to mix in. I use it with milk and ice for some morning protein and it takes a lot of shaking and seperates quickly. I prefer the JIF chocolate peanut powder but can't find it anymore. I add some extra chocolate to give it a little extra flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bit gritty, not chocolatey in drinks, good value
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's because I don't have access to a blender right now and I use this only in drinks, but I'm always left with peanut bits on the bottom that don't dissolve and have the mouthfeel of mushy sand. It also has very little chocolate flavor but it's a good value
customer_reviews.author: E.N.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a recent IDLife associate and am on a journey to a healthier lifestyle. I asked fellow associates for recipes they use for their shake. PBFit kept coming up so I asked what it was. Someone sent me the link to purchase via Amazon and I ordered it immediately. I am so glad I did. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It is definitely a staple for my health journey. I've been telling everyone about it! The delivery was quick as well!
customer_reviews.author: PastorMJ

customer_reviews.title: Order it every month; You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I order this product every single month with subscribe and save. It’s great to eat with frozen yogurt, spread on some toast, eat plain 😉, add to smoothies, and more! I can’t digest fats well due to a health condition so PB2 helps me get protein and enjoy peanut butter without the fat content. And BONUS this product is much cheaper on Amazon than when I’ve looked for it in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Better than peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: If you like peanut butter as much as I do but don't want the many calories that go with it, switch to PB fit. It's a powder that you mix with water that tastes as just as good and will save you fat cells. One word of caution, when mixing PB Fit with water, be very careful of the ratio of powder to water. Even a little too much water will make it too mushy. Other than that, enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Tom57

customer_reviews.title: So yummy
customer_reviews.text: This has added sugar so it's definitely yummier than the plan PB one, but it's also got less protein so I had to end up getting just the plain PB one so that I could get more protein in my diet. But this one is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Spoon licking good powdered peanut flour.
customer_reviews.text: Though I caution against the potential danger, I take a spoon to the tub and eat it right off the spoon! If you try this at home, just don’t inhale until all of the powder has melted or been swallowed. Needless to say, it’s a great way to boost the flavor of many things chocokate and vanilla from milk to yogurt to smoothie bowls!
customer_reviews.author: Heather W Purdin

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing. Only down fall is it has slightly higher calories than other chocolate powdered peanut butter but this is my second time ordering this from amazon and I think I’ll continue to do so because it’s so yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey larsen

customer_reviews.title: Yummy..
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, easy to use. Love adding this into any shake I make. Also love adding it into chocolate chip bread batter. It makes good creamy peanut butter for sandwiches and dipping foods too. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Stick to the original
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of PBFit. I love the original -- I use it everyday in my smoothies and love the flavor. I had such high hopes for the Chocolate version since it combines two of my favorite things (chocolate and peanut butter!). However, the flavor just falls short on both accounts. It doesn't taste like chocolate and I get a very faint flavor of peanut butter. I'll be sticking to the original PBFit.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Tastes just like Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I could eat peanut butter on a daily basis. Thanks to some wonderful recommendations from my nutrition coach, I can have peanut butter, but without all of the fat and calories. It tastes like peanut butter & if you add a smaller amount of water, it is the same consistency & isn't watery at all. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy powdered peanuts.
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed formulation from the previous chocolate peanut powder version. This new formula is too cohesive and clumps together too much. The old version was much more free flowing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second container. I use this product for smoothies or stirring into my oatmeal. It's easier to add than regular PB when you're in a hurry. Tastes good. I still use regular PB for sandwiches, however.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love adding this to my Herbalife shakes to create all the different recipes! The flavor is wonderful! The texture is a little bit gritty, but not too bad. I’ll still be buying this again and again. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Marr

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Chocolatey?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just prefer the taste of regular peanut butter PB Fit, but I had been so excited to try the chocolate peanut butter version and was disappointed. It's a bit sweeter, but I wouldn't really call the taste "chocolate". Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use pbfit2 chocolate to intensify the chocolate taste in my protein smoothies, mix it in my oatmeal and chia puddings, etc. Chocolate is hard to find around here so I appreciate finding a big tub online.
customer_reviews.author: KCintheDogHouse

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I really was surprised how rich and tasty this powder is. I like a low sugar protein shake and mix this product with almond milk, a scoop of protein powder and a banana....yum. My grandsons beg me to make them a shake all the time. Very healthy treat for them.
customer_reviews.author: LeeOra Scott

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible taste but that’s not the vendors fault. Great service from the vendor. They refunded me immediately I will buy from them again but def not that peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: sheree

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I missed peanut butter! I finally have a substitute that is very flavorful and low in calories, has the healthy without the bad. I love it added to many things, including my morning cup of hot beverage (I drink PERO and love it).
customer_reviews.author: Nancy13T

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is so good! The best powdered peanut butter brand by far. And the people complaining about not tasting like chocolate were probably expecting some sort of Nutella I guess, it's a mild chocolate flavor, but it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopes

customer_reviews.title: No chocolate taste
customer_reviews.text: No chocolate taste at all. Disappointed that this has no chocolate flavor at all. It tastes more like dark roasted peanuts. I would say even a little burned taste to it. No returns, so I’m stuck with it. The regular PB2 is much better.
customer_reviews.author: KSKARAD78

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great added into protein shakes. We like this one because it is 'chocolate peanut butter' and we have only found plain 'peanut butter' at walmart and costco.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this to the plain PB version. Not sure exactly why but it tastes better in shakes. I really don't get much Chocolate taste, but the PB flavor pops a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Victor E

customer_reviews.title: Delicious I love it in everyway
customer_reviews.text: This powder is wonderful I eat peanut butter almost everyday so this is perfect for me I add it to my Protein Shake similar flavor that compliment it Hopefully now I will loose weight too
customer_reviews.author: VBowers

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet For Me
customer_reviews.text: I find this flavor too sweet. I have previously used the plain peanut butter. I will have to adjust my smoothie recipe to use this chocolate/peanut butter flavor!
customer_reviews.author: M  Jo

customer_reviews.title: Scrumptious!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg how did I not know about this product sooner? People ATTENTION!!! Buy this NOW!! It is really good. I’ve had the peanut butter and the peanut butter w chocolate and that one is my fave but both fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The taste
customer_reviews.text: I love peanut butter so I love the taste of peanut butter and chocolate. I already use a protein powder but needed a change up. This helps out. I can go from one to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Where is the chocolate flavor and why is it even listed on the label?
customer_reviews.text: Peanut butter powder check. Chocolate? Missing in action! None detected. Honestly, this product must have been mislabeled with the plain PB. I ordered both and they taste identical. If you want chocolate in your peanut butter skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: CoolPhotoTools

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Two heaping tablespoons of this powder 2 frozen bananas 3-4 cups of kale or spinach 2-3 cups of water 3-4 ice cubes It's filling and tastes like a milk shake - with about 250 calories.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zelizer

customer_reviews.title: I like this !!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes pretty much like peanut butter! It has lower calories and is nutritious. It takes a bit to get the mixture correct but once you do, it is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have options
customer_reviews.text: To me it doesn’t taste a lot like chocolate and peanut butter. It either taste like peanut butter or chocolate. Which is ok, PB Fit makes a great product
customer_reviews.author: Reed C

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes great. I use 3 Tablespoons of product in my shakes and it’s 105 calories. I love this protein powder. This is my second container.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hallowell

customer_reviews.title: PB Fit Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Better price than Wal-Mart & always in stock. Recipe: 1 banana, 30% Silk, ice, Ninja blender. 30 sec to YUM!
customer_reviews.author: CFlittlerock,ar

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and love the title chocolate fix in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste very much. Love the chocolate with the peanut, what can be better. It is easy to prepare and shelf stable. I have not done this but if you really miss the oil, you could add a few drops of neutral oil after mixing in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Duck STL

customer_reviews.title: peanut butter without the fat!
customer_reviews.text: Peanut butter was the enemy when it came to getting abs! Enter pb2. My dreams are a reality. Pro tip: sprinkle in the water a tiny bit at a time To get the consistency you want. Spread on a chocolate rice cake and for under 100 calories you’ve got a nice balanced Sweet and salty dessert with almost no fat, Minimal sugar, and A little protein.
customer_reviews.author: WeLoveErie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I usually use this for post workout snack to feed the muscle. Very good and healthy without the guilt. I mix it with protein to gain more of a small meal replacement.
customer_reviews.author: EliSma

customer_reviews.title: Gritty / Crunchy ??? What happened to Quality ????
customer_reviews.text: Very gritty / crunchy Does not mix thoroughly at all, leave peanut grit behind... horrible... Do Not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a lot, and I really like it. Tastes great, easily blends into shakes, smoothies, and makes a good peanut butter cheesecake!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome peanut butter powder
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this! I just recently came across it and it’s the best and healthiest peanut butter I ever tasted and it has chocolate in it!!!! Bonus!!!!! So many things you can do with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not as good as PB2.
customer_reviews.text: PB2 has gone up in price -- a LOT -- lately, and PBFit is cheaper. I gave it a try and it's okay. It's certainly not blecch, but I much prefer PB2.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not chocolately at all
customer_reviews.text: I have checked the label on this a dozen times..I have finally decided it must be mislabeled..I am pretty sure it is just peanut powder..not chocolate peanut powder..i will take e a long time to use this up.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Meese

customer_reviews.title: texture and flavor
customer_reviews.text: Pretty interesting love the lover fat and calories... still trying to get the texture down right. Flavor wise it's okay, I like the Chocolate Peanut Butter the best.
customer_reviews.author: robin wooddy

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I make a protein shake in morning and add the peanut butter powder to it. The taste is great. Having chocolate makes it even better. Will continue ordering the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Edgygirl7

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this product needs added sugar? PB2 brand tastes better and doesn't have any added sugar. If price matters more, then this is probably better to buy. If you care about sugar content, go with PB2 instead.
customer_reviews.author: hi

product_meta.title: PBfit All-Natural Chocolate Peanut Butter Powder, Powdered Peanut Spread from Real Roasted Pressed Peanuts and Cocoa, 5g of Protein (30 oz.)
feature_bullets: SAME GREAT TASTE: PBfit All-Natural Chocolate Peanut Butter Powder uses premium cocoa to give you the chocolate you crave & the protein you need. It beats hazelnut & chocolate nut spreads with 82% less fat & 1/3 the calories of other chocolate nut spreads.

PROTEIN POWER: With 5g of protein in one serving of Chocolate PBfit, you can get a boost of protein right before your workout at the gym. Try adding it to the protein powder you already use or use it in your morning smoothie for a delicious protein boost. Great for men and women.

SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Chocolate PBfit is made with 4 simple ingredients: peanuts, cane sugar, cocoa, and salt. Did we mention it's all-natural and gluten-free? It’s just pure, delicious, peanut butter, and cocoa flavor in a low-fat powder.

DELICIOUSNESS DEFINED: BetterBody Foods is committed to using foods made with natural ingredients you can pronounce. Our Chocolate PBfit is gluten-free, dairy-free, and soy-free but not taste-free because even healthy people have taste buds.

BLEND, BAKE, OR SHAKE: When it comes to the uses for Chocolate PBfit, the possibilities are endless! Mix into baked goods like bread, pancakes, waffles, and cookies to add a great chocolatey peanut butter flavor. You can also blend it into breakfast smoothies and other drinks for a tasty, low-fat protein boost after the gym! Great for men and women!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
